Your Honor, Jennifer Peterson is currently being held against her will in a care facility.

translation.en: She was put there by this woman, who has falsely asserted that Jennifer is of ill health,
translation.es: Esta mujer la metió ahí, adjudicando que su salud está deteriorada,

translation.en: when in fact, she's perfectly fine.
translation.es: cuando en realidad, está perfectamente bien.

translation.en: Who are you, sir? I have not seen you in here before.

translation.en: Dean Ericson, Your Honor. These are my associates.
translation.es: Dean Ericson, su señoría. Ellos son mis socios.

translation.en: We represent the interests of Jennifer Peterson,
translation.es: Representamos los intereses de Jennifer Peterson,

translation.es: Señor, ¿puede presentar algún documento que pruebe que es su abogado?

translation.es: Actúo en nombre de las partes que están muy preocupadas por Jennifer

translation.es: y por el trato indignante que recibió.

translation.en: They're friends of Ms. Peterson who wish to remain anonymous.

Either you show me some paperwork that proves you are Ms. Peterson's lawyer,

translation.es: a una audiencia para que hablen por sí mismas.

Look-- Whoa!

Stop!
Fuck this.
Good morning.
Good morning. My name is Walter Smith.

- Mr. Smith? - Mr. Smith.
Yeah.
Marla.

What?

translation.en: You can see, we're--
And look at this.
I found an obituary of the dead girl in an old newspaper.

Actually, yes.
My father has a friend who's a resident here,

- It'd mean a lot. - Of course. What is the name?
Jennifer Peterson.
Is there a problem? No, uh…
Jennifer's been unwell. She's resting.

translation.en: Of course. The thing is, Jennifer's guardian has stipulated
translation.es: Claro. Lo que pasa es que la tutora de Jennifer dispuso que solo tenga visitas autorizadas.

translation.en: that she have only approved visitors.
translation.es: dispuso que solo tenga visitas autorizadas.

translation.en: That's odd. She sounds, uh, a bit more like a prisoner than a guest.

translation.en: No. No, um, no.
Um, tell you what. Why don't I try and get, Jennifer's guardian on the phone and see what I can do?
translation.es: Escuche, puedo intentar llamar a su tutora a ver qué puedo hacer.

translation.en: Of course.
Hey! Hey! What'd you do to him?
- Ah, shit. - Somebody help Mr. Rice!
translation.es: - Mierda. - Alguien ayude al Sr. Rice.

translation.en: Find her! Go!
- Help! - Jerry!
Oh shit.
Lock it down. Lock it down!
Then who do we have?
I don't know, but this stolen identity is incredibly sophisticated.
translation.es: No sé, pero es una identidad robada realmente sofisticada.

translation.es: y registros impositivos desde hace 40 años.

translation.en: I mean, they've scrubbed all trace of the real Jennifer Peterson,
translation.es: Eliminaron todo rastro de la verdadera Jennifer Peterson,

translation.en: including her death certificate.
Marla Grayson. Yeah.
Fuck.
I'm on my way.
Madam!
Madam?
Chad.
Thank you.
Madam!
Get down on the ground!
Madam?
Hello?
Out of the way!
Get out of the way!
About fucking time!
- Open the door. - You don't wanna do this.

translation.en: Open it!
Listen to me.
I am prepared to kill you to get out of here.
translation.es: Estoy dispuesto a matarlos para salir de aquí.

translation.en: Are you prepared to die to stop me? Huh?
I didn't think so.
- - Thank you.
Right this way, ma'am.
- Hi. -
- Get the fuck off of me! - That way!
Fuck you!
- We got you. - No! No, you don't!
Yeah, vacation is over.
Let's go.
Weapons cold! Weapons cold! Hands out! Go around the back!
What is your name?
Why'd you want to kidnap that little old lady?
translation.es: ¿Por qué querías secuestrar a esa anciana?

translation.en: Wanna make your phone call?
Want a doughnut?
He doesn't know it yet, but we found him in our system. He's done time before.
translation.es: Aún no lo sabe, pero lo encontramos en nuestro sistema. Tiene antecedentes.

Alexi Ignatyev.
Brother of Nicholas Ignatyev,
who was once a brigadier in the Cleveland Russian Mafia.
translation.es: exbrigadier de la mafia rusa de Cleveland.

translation.en: Was?
Nicholas died seven years ago in a fire along with his boss Roman Lunyov.
translation.es: Nicholas murió hace siete años en un incendio con su jefe Roman Lunyov

translation.en: It was arson. A hit. They'd been caught skimming.
translation.es: Fue un ataque intencional. Los atraparon robando.

translation.en: These assholes were drug smugglers and implicated in a bunch of murders.
translation.es: Eran narcotraficantes y están implicados en varios asesinatos.

translation.en: We thought Alexi died in the fire too, but here he is, trying to kidnap your ward.
translation.es: Pensamos que Alexi también había muerto, pero intentó secuestrar a la anciana.

translation.en: Who is she, anyway, your ward? Nobody, she's a retired businesswoman.
translation.es: - ¿Quién es la señora? - Es una mujer de negocios retirada.

translation.en: Rich?
So- so.
Well, maybe it was just a stick- up job.
You guys did good today, stopping them. This guy's a bad dude.
translation.es: Hicieron bien en detenerlos. Son pesados.

translation.en: - Do me a favor? - Hmm?
Keep us in the loop if you hear anything else.
translation.es: Mantennos informadas de lo que pase.

translation.en: Sure thing, Frankie.
- Lou. - Huh?
Don't call me Frankie.
You used to like being called Frankie.
translation.es: Te gustaba que te dijeran Frankie.

translation.en: Yeah, not anymore.
Frankie?
- It used to be a thing for a second. - I like it.
translation.es: - Me duró muy poco tiempo. - Me gusta.

translation.en: - Frankie. - No.
Yeah, it's me.
I need something.
Oh, hello.
Sorry. I'm just closing up. Did you have an appointment?

translation.en: Fran?
Marla?
You heard about Karen? Yeah. Oh my God, baby.

translation.en: Okay, pack a bag.
We gotta go. If they killed her, we're next.
We don't know they killed her.
Karen may have had trouble we didn't know about. Oh really? Do you believe that?

translation.en: Okay, then.
Marla, I don't want you to get shot in the head, and I don't wanna get shot either.

translation.en: So we don't get shot in the head.
Marla, we went after Jennifer Peterson because she was a cherry.
translation.es: Marla, nos metimos con Jennifer Peterson porque era una joyita.

translation.en: A cherry with no strings attached, baby, but she, she's a spider web.

translation.en: - And we're gonna get trapped in it. - Well, maybe, but maybe not.
translation.es: - Y quedaremos atrapadas. - Quizá, pero quizá no.

translation.en: They brought guns into a care home. They're the Russian mafia, Marla.
translation.es: Entraron con armas a un asilo. Son de la mafia rusa, Marla.

translation.en: - Ex- Russian mafia. - Marla, pack a fucking bag.
translation.es: - Ex mafia rusa. - Marla, empaca tus cosas.

translation.en: Fuck.
Curtis, it's Marla.
Yeah, we saw.
I know. I know.
Yeah, you should close the office. Hang tight for a while. Okay?

of all the empty, unsold properties on our books as soon as you can?
translation.es: de todas las propiedades vacías de nuestros registros cuanto antes.

translation.en: Okay.
Thanks. Goodbye.
It's gonna be okay.
Jennifer, how are you feeling?
Good.
Heard about Dr. Amos.

What? No. That idiot.
But you are connected to the Russian mafia?

translation.en: He'll kill you next.
I mean, that is unless you get me out of here now.

translation.en: Then he might let you live.
Jennifer, listen to me carefully.
I don't lose. I won't lose.
translation.es: Yo no pierdo. No voy a perder.

translation.en: I'm never letting you go.
translation.es: Nunca te voy a dejar ir.

translation.en: I own you.
And I will drain you of your money, your comfort, and your self- respect.

translation.en: Not because I want to,
not because I'll enjoy it or because I plan for it,
translation.es: no porque lo disfrute ni porque lo planeé,

translation.es: sino porque tu gente no siguió las reglas.

translation.en: You wanna beat me?
Well, come at me fair and square. You get me in a courtroom. You outplay me.
translation.es: Bueno, vengan y jueguen limpio. Enfréntenme y gánenme en el tribunal.

translation.es: Esta es tu vida ahora, Jennifer.

translation.es: que padece demencia, incontinencia y artritis.

except me.
Jennifer,
or whoever the hell you really are,

translation.en: you're gonna die in here,
alone and in terrible pain.
Hey! Let her go! Let her go!
Come on. Come on.
- There you go. Let her go. Nice and easy. - Don't! She's the one!

Good Lord.
Marla, are you-- are you okay?
Did she hurt you?
Only superficially.
I got lucky, but what about next time?

translation.es: Como puede ver, su salud mental se ha deteriorado gravemente.

translation.en: As this doctor's note describes,
Ms. Peterson has become delusional, paranoid,
translation.es: la señora Peterson se volvió delirante, paranoica

translation.en: and violent.
She's a danger to others and herself.
translation.es: Es una amenaza para ella y para el resto.

translation.en: And her doctor and I recommend
that she be moved immediately to a secure psychiatric facility
translation.es: trasladarla de inmediato a un centro psiquiátrico,

translation.en: I agree.
Don't worry.

- It's a nice one. - You mind holding on to it for a while? Keep it in your safe.

No. I just have some errands to run. I don't want it in my purse all day.

Fran says hello.

In the future, maybe.

Fuck.

Okay.
Bye.
What happened?
Oh my God. Are you okay?
- I don't know. I think somebody-- - Oh my God!

translation.en: Get off me!
Hello, Marla Grayson.
I don't like you.
You only just met me.
You know,
you remind me of someone I knew when I was younger.

Amusing, confident.
Uncooperative.

Who are you?
A dangerous man.
It says that on your business card?
- You should be scared right now. - Why?
Are you gonna make another big fucking speech?
Ow. Jesus fucking Christ.

translation.es: Están dando vuelta tu oficina, tu casa,

translation.es: y, si no encuentran lo que buscan,

translation.en: I will tear you apart until you tell me where they are.
translation.es: te haré sufrir hasta que me digas dónde están.

That's your mother, isn't it?
After I destroy you, I will destroy her.

translation.en: Go ahead. I don't give a shit about that fucking sociopath.

translation.en: Yeah, I--
I don't like being angry.
I much prefer to be calm.
But you have compromised the life I spent years carefully building.

You're either Nicholas Ignatyev or Roman Lunyov,

translation.es: Y me inclino por Roman porque pareces más un jefe que un soldado.

translation.es: Así que, fingiste tu propia muerte

translation.es: usaran a tu madre para descubrirte, y la convertiste en Jennifer Peterson.

Okay.
You're not afraid of death? Do you remember how scary it was in 1807?

translation.es: No, yo tampoco, porque aún no estaba viva.

When you sent that lawyer with a case full of money,

translation.es: no te equivocaste, estoy dispuesta a venderme,

- Do you have a figure in mind? - Yeah.

Of-- of-- of course you do.
You are…
you are brave, Ms. Grayson. Stupid, but-- but brave.

because playing fair, being scared, that gets you nowhere.

You know that.
And I wanna be rich, Mr. Lunyov.

translation.en: I wanna be very
fucking rich.
And my bet is that ten million dollars, that's not such a big deal for you.

translation.en: But for me, that's a start.
translation.es: Pero para mí, es un comienzo.

translation.en: That's enough to be able to use money as a weapon.
translation.es: Es suficiente para usar el dinero como arma.

translation.en: Like a bludgeon, the way real rich people do.
translation.es: Como un garrote, como hacen los ricos.

translation.en: That's what I want.
You hold no cards. I have your mother, and I have your diamonds.
translation.es: - No tienes juego. - Tengo a tu madre y los diamantes.

translation.en: And I've made sure that if I die, you'll never see those diamonds.

translation.en: And it'll be so
complicated to extricate your mother from her situation
translation.es: complicado sacar a tu madre de su situación,

translation.en: that it'll take years before she sees freedom.
translation.es: que pasarán años antes de que vea la libertad.

translation.en: If she even lives that long.
Just pay me off.
It's the easiest way.
Get rid of her.
Make sure it looks organic.
You have a payphone?
I'll give you fifty dollars if you let me make a call on your cell.

translation.en: Can you call me a cab?
Oh, Fran!
Oh, baby. No!
Oh my God.
Fran?
Fran!
Marla.
I thought we were dead.
No.
We're alive, hon.
- I'm scared. - I'm so fucking sorry. I'm so sorry.
It's okay. It's okay.
How are you feeling?
Feeling better.
What's that, Marla?
It's the license plate of the car our Russian friend was driving.

translation.en: Fran, say the word, and we're gone.
translation.es: Fran, si me lo pides, nos vamos.

translation.en: We start again somewhere new.
Just us.
And do what?
We lost everything.
Not quite everything.
We can take them and run.
Or you can make a call and get me the address

If we run, we'll always be looking over our shoulders.
translation.es: Si huimos, siempre estaremos con miedo.

translation.en: Isn't it better to finish this now?
You have a plan.
I do.
Will it work?
I don't know.
Give me the phone.
Okay, here we are. This is the address for plate F8T444.
translation.es: Bueno, es aquí. Esta es la dirección de la matrícula F8T444.

translation.en: That-- That one?
- Yeah. - He can't live here.
Maybe the plate was stolen?
No, the plate definitely matched a black Yukon.
translation.es: No, era la matrícula de un Yukon negro.

translation.en: Well, go around the back. I wanna get a closer look.
translation.es: Ve por atrás. Quiero ver más de cerca.

translation.en: It's not him. It's his driver.

translation.en: Go. He's on the move.
There, follow him!
He's pulling up.
Sir, your car's downstairs.
Be careful.
Hi. Uh…

I'm actually a little early.
Uh, is there a restroom I could use while I'm waiting?
Uh, sure. It's right around this corner and to your left.
translation.es: Claro. A la vuelta a la izquierda.

translation.en: Thanks.
Hi, can you help me?
I think I'm on totally the wrong level, and I can't find the exit. Is this B1? Or?
translation.es: Creo que estoy en el nivel equivocado y no encuentro la salida. ¿Es el primero?

translation.en: This is level two. The exit's that way, around the corner.
translation.es: No, el segundo subsuelo. La salida está allí.

translation.en: - Can't I use that elevator right there? - That's a private ele--
translation.es: - ¿No puedo usar ese ascensor? - Es privado.

translation.en: Where is Jackson?
Hello again.
Sir? Hey!
Is he in there?
Lying in a pool of his own urine.
translation.es: En un charco de su propia orina.

translation.en: You wanna go get rid of him?
Lead the way.
How much do you think he weighs? A hundred pounds?
One ten, yeah.
Sleep tight, motherfucker.
There you are.
How are you feeling?
Don't try to talk.
You have a tube in your throat.
translation.es: Tienes un tubo en la garganta.

translation.en: See that?
You're a John Doe.
You nearly died of an overdose. You're lucky they found you in time.
translation.es: Casi mueres de sobredosis. Qué suerte que te encontraron a tiempo.

translation.en: You wanna hear an interesting fact?
When an incapacitated John Doe is found,
translation.es: Cuando encuentran a un desconocido incapacitado,

translation.en: the state automatically appoints them a legal guardian
translation.es: el estado les asigna un tutor legal

translation.en: to oversee their treatment and welfare.
translation.es: para supervisar su tratamiento y bienestar.

translation.en: You know where this is going, right?
I'm now your legal guardian.
I got you, John Doe.
I can do whatever I want with you.
translation.es: Puedo hacer lo que quiera contigo.

translation.en: Now let's find a nurse to get that tube out of your throat
translation.es: Llamemos a una enfermera para que te quite ese tubo de la garganta,

translation.en: so you can arrange for ten million dollars to be moved into my account.
translation.es: y puedas ordenar el depósito de 10 millones a mi cuenta bancaria.

translation.en: How's the throat?
Still painful.
I know you don't like losing,
translation.es: Sé que no te gusta perder,

translation.en: but as your guardian, I suggest you swallow your pride and pay me off.
translation.es: pero, como tu tutora, sugiero que te tragues el orgullo y me pagues.

translation.en: You can have your mother,
your diamonds,
your freedom.
You'll never see me again.
Even if I pay you off,
are you not afraid I'll still kill you?
I'm not afraid, no.
I can make it happen easily.
I know.
But I could just as easily kill you if this thing continues any longer.
translation.es: Pero yo también podría matarte fácilmente si esto se prolonga.

translation.en: Okay.
- Okay? - Let's end this now.
I'll give you the ten million dollars.
I can arrange that.
However--
However?
I'd like to propose an alternative.
Instead of me giving you ten million dollars…
translation.es: En vez de darte diez millones de dólares,

translation.en: we become partners.
Go into business together.
- Are you fucking with me? - No, I'm serious.
I mean…
I hate you,
but, ugh,
the money we could make…
You're a rare person, Marla.
Your determination is, uh,
frankly, it's scary, but this guardianship grift is ripe.
translation.es: francamente, da miedo. Tus estafas con las tutelas llegaron a su punto máximo.

translation.en: But right now, it's small potatoes.
translation.es: Son una fracción de lo que podrían ser.

translation.en: I propose we create a monster.
translation.es: Te propongo que creemos un monstruo.

translation.en: A countrywide guardianship corporation
translation.es: Una corporación de tutelas a escala nacional.

translation.en: with you as CEO and co- owner.
translation.es: Tú serás la directora y cofundadora.

translation.en: Use my money, use your…
skills.
Destroy the competition.
Take control of the entire market.
- You wanna start a company with me? - Not just one company.
translation.es: - ¿Quieres montar una compañía conmigo? - No solo una compañía.

translation.en: A corporation with 80 different companies all registered offshore,
translation.es: Una corporación con 80 compañías registradas en el exterior

translation.en: charging each other invoices, burying profit.
translation.es: que se facturen entre sí para tapar las ganancias.

translation.en: A real estate arm, a legal arm, a training arm,
translation.es: Una rama inmobiliaria, una legal, una de formación,

translation.en: a medical arm, a pharmaceutical arm.
- Our own chain of care homes. - Exactly.
With thousands of guardians working for us,
translation.es: Con miles de tutores que trabajen para nosotros

translation.en: with hundreds of thousands of wards in our care.
translation.es: y cientos de miles de personas bajo nuestra tutela.

translation.en: That way, you win…
but I win too.
And we make each other billions of dollars
translation.es: Y ganaremos miles de millones de dólares

translation.en: legally…
mostly.
What about the diamonds?
Fuck the diamonds.
Split them 50- 50.
How do we trust each other?
If we make each other rich,
the trust will follow.
So are you in?
Every fortune ever accumulated started with a leap of faith.
translation.es: Toda fortuna comienza con un salto de fe.

translation.en: But before you take that leap,
translation.es: Pero antes de dar ese salto,

translation.en: first take a long, hard look at yourself.
translation.es: primero, hay que conocerse muy bien.

translation.en: Know who you are.
Ask yourself.
Am I an insider
or am I an outsider?
Am I a lamb?
Or am I a lion?
Am I a predator?
Or am I prey?
Am I good at money?
Or am I good at people?
What am I willing to sacrifice
to achieve my dreams?
Marla Grayson, CEO and founder--
translation.es: Marla Grayson, directora general y fundadora…

translation.en: What lines will I not cross?
Don't try to be anyone else.
Just know who you are and use that to your advantage.
translation.es: Conócete bien y usa eso a tu favor.

translation.en: So, who are you?
Me?
I'm just someone who cares.
So are you a lion or a lamb?
I'm a lioness.
And I will do whatever I need to do to protect the people I care about.
translation.es: Y haré lo que sea necesario para proteger a la gente que me importa.

translation.en: - - Yeah!
You've had amazing success in such a short period of time.
translation.es: Has tenido un éxito increíble en tan poco tiempo.

translation.en: Marla, what's your secret?
There is no secret, Peter.
All it takes is hard work
and the courage and determination to never give up.
translation.es: coraje y determinación para no rendirse nunca.

translation.en: So now you are a rich woman.
translation.es: Así que ahora eres una mujer rica.

translation.en: How much are you worth? How much do you have in the bank?
translation.es: ¿Cuánto vales ahora? ¿Cuánto tienes en el banco?

translation.en: You were great!
Ugh. My cheeks are aching from forcing that smile for so long.
translation.es: Me duelen las mejillas de forzar la sonrisa tanto tiempo.

translation.en: I haven't counted recently.
But you are firmly in the top slice of the 1%.
translation.es: Pero sin duda eres parte del 1 %.

translation.en: What should we do now?
- Whatever the fuck we want! - Hey, bitch!
And you're still only 39. That must feel good.
translation.es: Y solo tienes 39. Debe sentirse bien.

translation.en: Hey, bitch.
- Oh. Listen, I don't have time-- - Marla!
- No! Security! - Oh my God!
My mom died!
Help! We need help!
You never let me see her, and she died in there alone, you fucking bitch.
translation.es: Nunca me dejaste verla, y murió sola, maldita perra.

translation.en: - We need help! - Take the weapon!
Fucking bitch!
Someone call help!
M-- Marla, baby, you're gonna be fine.
No, look at me, baby. Look at me. Look at me.
Listen to me. You're gonna be fine. You're gonna be-- Marla.
Help!  Help!
Marla!
No, Marla!
N-- No!
Help!
So with all the success…
translation.es: Así que, a pesar del éxito…

translation.en: Help!
…are you still ambitious?
Are there dreams you still want to achieve?
Peter, I am only just getting started.
Marla Grayson, CEO and founder
translation.es: Marla Grayson, directora ejecutiva y fundadora de Custodias Grayson, gracias.

translation.en: of Grayson Guardianships, thank you.
translation.es: directora ejecutiva y fundadora de Custodias Grayson, gracias.

translation.en: Thanks. It's been fun.
